text: nĩgũkorwo ariũ a Jusufu nĩmatuĩkĩte mĩhĩrĩga ĩĩrĩ, nĩyo mũhĩrĩga wa Manase, na wa Efiraimu.14:4 Jakubu nĩoire Manase na Efiraimu, ciana cia Jusufu, na akĩmatua ciana ciake (Kĩam 48:5); ũndũ ũyũ nĩguo watũmire Jakubu amagaĩre igai ta ciana ciake. Alawii matiigana kũgaĩrwo ithaka tiga o matũũra ma gũtũũra, na ithaka iria ciarigiicĩirie matũũra macio cia kũrĩithagia ndũũru ciao cia mbũri na ngʼombe.
